msg: AVRO-1098: CSharp: Fix compilation to work under older versions of Mono.

msg: CMIS-534: Server: enabled custom atom:id s

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-1097. Fix BinaryDecoder so that EOFException is thrown instead of a generic IOException when reading ints and longs past the end of file.

author: markt
msg: Simplify the poller by using the new per socket timeout to differentiate between connection and keepalive timeouts without using two pollers.
